opinions.text: Petition for Allowance of Appeal GRANTED, No. 25 W.D. Appeal Docket 1986.

casebody.head_matter:
507 A.2d 386
George SCHREINER, Duane Senay, Michael Elias, Joseph Feltz and Joseph Edwards v. The CITY OF McKEESPORT, Lou Washowich, Mayor; Samuel R. Vidnovich, Nicholas J. Skezas, Gerald F. Boyle, Joseph P.
